channel.title: Family on Nicola Iarocci

item.title: Foothills of Romagna
item.description: Between motorcycle rides with my friends from TOMCC Italia and family dinners at sunset, I spent most of the weekend in the foothills of Romagna. I’m fortunate to live close to such beautiful landscapes.
item.content:encoded: Between motorcycle rides with my friends from TOMCC Italia and family dinners at sunset, I spent most of the weekend in the foothills of Romagna. I’m fortunate to live close to such beautiful landscapes.
